title: Enable dithering in Canvas and remove blocking comment

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx, remove the comment in lines 323-325 that mentions 'dithering на уровне материалов — правильно' which is blocking dithering changes in the Canvas gl block

quotes: этот комментарий в строчках 323-325 тебе мешает применить в сборке введение этой строчки dithering true в канвас gl
Remove the old comment on line 323-325 to avoid future confusion

acceptanceCriteria: Lines 323-325 in CubeVisualization.tsx no longer contain the blocking comment about dithering

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx, add 'dithering: true' to the gl prop object of the Canvas component (around line 310), ensuring the gl object includes: antialias: true, powerPreference: 'high-performance', alpha: false, and dithering: true

quotes: Inside the gl={{ ... }} prop, add: dithering: true
gl={{ antialias: true, powerPreference: 'high-performance', alpha: false, dithering: true }}

acceptanceCriteria: The Canvas component's gl prop includes dithering: true
All other existing gl properties (antialias, powerPreference, alpha) are preserved
Dithering is enabled in the 3D rendering context

constraints: Do not modify any other properties in the Canvas gl configuration beyond adding dithering
Preserve all existing 3D rendering architecture and material-level settings
nonGoals: Changing dithering implementation at the material level
Modifying shader code or postprocessing effects
Altering any other Canvas configuration properties
